body:
Julia,

You can get the radiation using the HB_gridBasedSimulation and setting the _simulationType_ input to 1 (radiation). Pretty straightforward.

This [example](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Honeybee_Grid-based_Daylight_Simulation_Example_I&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0) can serve as a starting point. Is for daylight but just need to change the simulation type and probably the sky type.

If more help needed let me know, but i have the feeling you'll manage.

-A.
